column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I am not a huge fan of pork
column2: which is sometimes problematic when trying to order ramen at other restaurants. However
column3: Jinya has a great variety of chicken and plant-based broths. I usually get the chicken ramen dishes because the broth is extremely savory without being too heavy (unlike many pork broths
column4: in my opinion). I also love how Jinya has a large array of customizable add-ons and spice levels. Due to its immense popularity
column5: I recently tried the Jinya Bun as an appetizer. Although it was very flavorful and momentarily pleasing
column6: it was way too heavy and fatty for my preference. It caused me to be far too full to enjoy my ramen.
